Package at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.stm32

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RMCSAdvancedComponent
    A composition of RMCSControlComponent and RMCSSensorComponent.
    RMCSComponentManager
    The central manager that handles all incoming IData and, depending on the type of data, forwards it to the corresponding SensorDataListeners and RMCSControlComponents.
    All RMCSControlComponents have to register themselves with the RMCSComponentManager in order to get updated about new IControlData.
    All SensorDataListeners have to register themselves with the RMCSComponentManager in order to get updated about new SensorData.
    RMCSControlComponent
    The RMCSControlComponent-class is a base-class for all components of the RMCS, that directly or indirectly control parts of the RMCS (e.g.
    RMCSSensorComponent
    The RMCSSensorComponent-class is a base-class for all components of the RMCS, that are able to publish SensorData on the RMCS.
    STM32SpiInterface
    An Interface to control the data transmission to a STM32, that is connected through SPI.

    Used Pins for SPI communication:
    - MOSI _ GPIO12 _ Pin 19
    - MISO _ GPIO13 _ Pin 21
    - SCK __ GPIO14 _ Pin 23
    - GND __ ______ _ Pin 25
    - GND __ ______ _ Pin 6
    - TxD __ GPIO15 _ Pin 8
    - RxD __ GPIO16 _ Pin 10

    for pinout see: Raspberry Pi Pinout DON'T FORGET TO ENABLE SPI INTERFACE IN RASPI-CONFIG!
    STM32UartInterface
    This class reads data from the serial interface of the PI, which receives data from the STM32.
